name: Trius Cabernet Franc
shortDescr: Medium-bodied with flavours of juicy ripe currants and blackberry.
fullDescr: A Niagara favourite! Medium-bodied with flavours of juicy ripe currants and blackberry.

name: Peller Estates French Cross Shiraz
shortDescr: An easy drinking red wine for casual sipping or enjoy with medium flavoured foods.
fullDescr: An easy drinking red wine for casual sipping or enjoy with medium flavoured foods. Flavours of plum, black currant and spice linger through on the finish.

name: Peller Estates French Cross Chardonnay
shortDescr: A smooth, medium-bodied wine, well balanced between oak and apple fruit flavours.
fullDescr: A smooth, medium-bodied wine, well balanced between oak and apple fruit flavours. The smooth mouth feel followed by refreshing acidity makes this wine an excellent food partner.

name: Skinnygrape Rose
fullDescr: Light, fresh and fruity. This refreshing medium dry ros√© comes alive with flavours of red berry and Bartlett pear.

name: Domaine D'Or Superieur Red
shortDescr: Medium-bodied with rich aromas of ripe fruit and black cherries.
fullDescr: Medium-bodied with rich aromas of ripe fruit and black cherries. Soft and well balanced through the finish.

name: Black Cellar Malbec
shortDescr: Medium-bodied with rich aromas of ripe fruit and black cherries.
fullDescr: Medium-bodied with rich aromas of ripe fruit and black cherries. Soft and well balanced through the finish.

name: Peller Estates French Cross Sparkling Pinot Grigio
shortDescr: An aromatic sparkler with aromas of fresh tropical fruit and citrus notes.
fullDescr: An aromatic sparkler with aromas of fresh tropical fruit and citrus notes, highlighted by crisp grapefruit. enjoy with salty appetizers, hors d'oeuvres, and creamy cheeses. Excellent with frilled and poached fish, baked chicken sushi or your favourite punch.

name: Trius Vidal Icewine
shortDescr: A rich, luscious wine with perfectly sweet explosions of tropical fruit.
fullDescr: Niagara's purest luxury! A rich, luscious wine with perfectly sweet explosions of tropical fruit.

name: Peller Estates Family Series Riesling
shortDescr: A fabulous sipping wine that finishes with refreshing notes of citrus.
fullDescr: Light, fresh and fruity. A fabulous sipping wine that finishes with refreshing notes of citrus.
